an7.76:1.1: “Sattahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti.
an7.76:1.7: ubhayani kho panassa patimokkhani vittharena svagatani honti suvibhattani suppavattini suvinicchitani suttaso anubyanjanaso,
an7.76:1.8: catunnam jhananam abhicetasikanam ditthadhammasukhaviharanam nikamalabhi hoti akicchalabhi akasiralabhi,
an7.76:1.9: asavanam khaya anasavam cetovimuttim pannavimuttim dittheva dhamme sayam abhinna sacchikatva upasampajja viharati.
an7.76:1.10: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, sattahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu vinayadharo hoti”ti.
